about_the_game:
TRASHMORFERS- LET THEIR OWN WASTE BECOME THEIR OWN ENEMY

You are in the near future when human activity has seriously contaminated the entire planet. You are in a polluted nature where the trash outnumbers humans. A transform artificial intelligence has been placed on earth (by whom?) with the purpose to transform all the waste into actual enemy soldiers. Vast quantities of Single- use plastic form PVC 450 Con army, countless electrical and electronic devices form the WEEE army.

Third and First Person Choice (press P)
Use countless bullets and different weapons to complete the quest- reload system is included
Find the life potion
Protect yourself inside the Sanctuary Zone
Destroy the Trashmorfers: the PVCs and the WEEEs (Waste of Electrical and Electronic Equipment) -Challenging even for great shooters
Find Keys to deactivate TAI (the Transform Artificial Intelligence)
Be friends with our cute ally, aka LFF
Be aware of the ecological catastrophe that the human kind has caused because it’s your turn now to save our planet
New missions and updates on graphics and feautures as soon as posiible.
Check PDF for instructions.

We are just two post-graduate students and new developers from Greece. Our passion for games and our concerns about the environment urge us to create our very first game. We work hard to continually evolve it. However, we absolutely need your support to reach the gold version. Thank you all! Please be lenient!
YOU MUST TRY

a. Hide behind walls ( When you are near the concrete walls you press the roll and you hide)
b. Hiding crawl on the wall to the left & right (When you are hidden, using arrows you can move right or left)
c. Change side of wall hiding (When you are on the edge of a container and you reach the edge by pressing arrow and roll, you change side
d. Pretty cool jump ( If you are in cement, hidden, with the Up arrow and roll you can jump over)
e. Hiding shoot ( If you're in cement hiding and you aim, you get up and you can shoot. If you are in the container on the far left, with the left arrow you aim and shoot
f. Run to the wall (This is a tricky one. With the mouse, if you are a little close to a wall, a line appears starting from player to the wall and by pressing roll you run faster and hide in the wall)
